snippet: The department said in a statement that it had begun a prearranged trading plan that would dispose of its 300.1 million shares by early next year.
abstract: The department said in a statement that it had begun a prearranged trading plan that would dispose of its 300.1 million shares by early next year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Treasury to Begin Selling Off Its Remaining G.M. Stake
headline.print_headline: Treasury to Start Selling Off G.M. Stake
